room_title: Escape room "Search for the Grail" by Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield in New York
review: Our game master was great. The escape room was challenging but achievable if you bring the right team with you. Get stuck need a hint the game master is always watching and willing to give a little help. I will definitely going back to completed the rest of the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Search for the Grail" by Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield in New York
review: Matt was our Game Master! Long May he live!We did the holy grail escape room! It is themed so wonderfully! I will update more later tonight!
